pr_title: friendicons: add note icon in friends/ignore list

timeline.bodyText: This should use its own icon. (whether that's a copy of the notes plugin's icon or something else is fine) Maybe there's an ingame sprite which might work well for this?
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

replies.bodyText: couldnt find a good in game sprite (has to be a modicon) so copypasted the notes icon
replies.author: ThatGamerBlue

timeline.bodyText: How do you come to 14x12 as the dimensions? The scripts seem to indicate that the "Previous name" icon is 14x14
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

replies.bodyText: this is the dimensions of the icon that we add, maybe a better name?
replies.author: ThatGamerBlue

timeline.bodyText: Since the meaning the parameters is known, they should be listed in the javadoc. See some of the earlier ScriptID entries for examples.
timeline.author: Nightfirecat
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -233,4 +233,16 @@
 	 */
 	@ScriptArguments(integer = 2)
 	public static final int TOPLEVEL_RESIZE = 909;
+
+	/**
+	 * Called when the friends list is updated

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/runelite-api/src/main/java/net/runelite/api/ScriptID.java b/runelite-api/src/main/java/net/runelite/api/ScriptID.java
index 51d8c1f72..1fb85b014 100644
--- a/runelite-api/src/main/java/net/runelite/api/ScriptID.java
+++ b/runelite-api/src/main/java/net/runelite/api/ScriptID.java

@@ -233,16 +233,4 @@ public final class ScriptID
 	 */
 	@ScriptArguments(integer = 2)
 	public static final int TOPLEVEL_RESIZE = 909;
-
-	/**
-	 * Called when the friends list is updated
-	 */
-	@ScriptArguments(integer = 9)
-	public static final int FRIENDS_UPDATE = 631;
-
-	/**
-	 * Called when the ignore list is updated
-	 */
-	@ScriptArguments(integer = 7)
-	public static final int IGNORE_UPDATE = 630;
 }

timeline.bodyText: While this file doesn't seem to maintain the usual definitions order of getConfig(), startUp(), shutDown(), @Subscribers, then instance/static methods (it has some instance methods mixed with the subscribers), shutDown() should definitely be defined here before defining any more subscribers.
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.bodyText: Check both config group and config key.
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

replies.bodyText: we need to rebuild the list when a note changes too, imo the easiest way is to do it here
replies.author: ThatGamerBlue

replies.bodyText: List rebuilding can be explicitly added to the tail end of setFriendNote() instead of implicitly called here after the config change event dispatches. Alternately, you can check that the key matches "showIcons" or starts with KEY_PREFIX.
replies.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.bodyText: Make the plugin's config group package-private and reference it here.
timeline.author: Nightfirecat
